this isnt in the wrong place. if you put some thought into it. ok, yes... this is a psx emulator, but what does it do? it makes psx games playable on pc. so it could go under either category... psx games or pc games. if you think really hard about it though you're playing games on this through pc, not psx. therefore to me, it made more since to upload this under pc games, as im not playing them on psx. though i get where you are coming from. my psx game torrents though i prolly shoulda put under psx games but i never knew the site to have a psx option, never noticed it b4 (until this upload). actually i dont think it was always there. i could be wrong though.

anyhow, you are welcome. more to come in the future.

abualanod- 

There is a good guide for connecting a PS3 controller to the pc at http://www.gamefront.com/how-to-use-a-ps3-controller-on-a-pc/

Good luck
so the gameshark is that the original like 2.2 or higher codes wont work? and also i cant seem to be able to add codes onto gameshark 5 how i do that?

@Moogles1 the "gameshark.iso" is actually newer than the others the v5. to add cheats ur best off using pec psx emulation cheater. it's located in the plugins folder. you open pec.exe. it's pretty easy to use, just look up a tutorial on how to use it and how to add cheats to it (google). id type one now but i gotta hit the sack.
